description: Spearheaded the successful execution of software implementations for new clients, contributing to new annual recurring revenue surpassing $3 million. Introduced agile management practices within the data engineering and business intelligence teams. Established efficient onboarding procedures that facilitated the expansion of the project management team, enabling the company to meet growing demands effectively.

Orchestrated the strategic planning and execution of multi-million dollar building product deliveries, leveraging agile methodologies in collaboration with a cross-functional team. Developed a robust QC process and issue tracking system, resulting in the successful resolution of hundreds of quality issues per week and a dramatic increase in issue resolution cycle time efficiency.

Specialized in producing intricate construction documents for both commercial and residential structures. Streamlined the permitting process by coding automated forms for the engineering team, leading to a 50% reduction in permitting form completion time company-wide.
